post:
Hello,

We are running a special offer for HD members 50% off any KVM VPS for as long as you keep it!

Use promotion code: HD50

All VPS's include the following:

- KVM - No Over Selling, All Guaranteed resources!
- Linux (and custom OS's such as FreeBSD, Arch and more!)
- 5+ CD-ROM ISO CD Discs to install custom operating systems
- 8+ Pre-ready Linux images to choose from
- 1000 Mbps port
- Guaranteed Ram - No burst, no oversold servers, fully allocated ram!
- Raid-10 or 5 ultra-fast disk systems
- Virtualizor VPS Administration Panel Access (web based)
- Automated Reboots
- Automated OS Reloads
- KVM/Console Access to all VPS's included free!
- Bring your own license versions for Windows 2008/2012, Win 8
- Control Panels Available: cPanel, DirectAdmin and Plesk
- 1 IP Address included, up to 5 per VPS available
- Basic Support Services Included Free. Live chat, and help desk support
- 7-day money back guarantee
- NO term contract (month to month)
- NO Setup fees
